entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain and possible thunderstorms. Amounts may approach warning criteria, mostly about the ranges. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Note, another period of heavy rain is likely on Thursday morning and a Warning for this may be issued closer to the time. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.
